alfred3_scheduler.scheduler

alfred3_scheduler.scheduler¶

Functionality for coordinating session slots.

Classes

DataHandler(col, identifier, log)

Handles atomic interactions with MongoDB objects.

DataTypes()

Data types for identifying database objects.

DateSlot(dateslot_id, exp)

Date slot class.

DateSlotData(start, datetime.datetime], ...)

Date slot class.

Scheduler([reservation_time, ...])

Scheduler class.

SchedulerURLHandler(scheduler, exp)

Handles URLs for the Scheduler.

Exceptions

Busy

Raised if access to a database object fails because it is busy (i.e., locked).

SchedulerException

Base class for scheduler exceptions.
